overview: Vakeel Babu is the online alias of Shiraz Hassan when he creates content online with facts about the law. Although he struggles to find clients in real life, he has a huge online fanbase who have faith in the legal system because of him. The plot takes a turn when an unknown woman calls him with a peculiar case where the accused is someone of high importance in society. Shiraz is faced with the dilemma to pursue a case that could either make or break his career or stay obscured safely in the digital world under a name that is not his. Actor Abhishek Banerjee plays the lead with Sumit Purohit at the helm.
title: Vakeel Babu
